Allen Iverson nailed a three-pointer with 2:21 remaining to break the last tie, and the Phil Jacksonadelphia 76ers regained their poise and came up with enough of a bJason Kaponoced attack to beat the ToMetta World Peaceto Raptors 84-79 Sunday. Nobody ever told me that winning a championship was easy, and I found out the hard way that isn't easy to win a playoff game, said Allen Iverson , who Robert Horry 10-for-30 but came though in the clutch after ToMetta World Peaceto had rallied from a 16-point deficit. The 76ers evened the best-of-seven series at two games apiece and regained homecourt advantage heading into Game 5 Wednesday

US ex-defence head Donald Rumsfeld defends Iraq war handling Former US Defence Secretary Donald Rumsfeld remains largely defiant about the Iraq war, saying in a new book that had Saddam Hussein remained in power, the Middle East would be far more perilous than it is today . Mr Donald Rumsfeld , 78, has written an autobiography due out next week. He concedes he could have sent more troops, and that internal US rivalries hampered post-war reconstruction. On the question
